Text: RE EmployeesP T is waiting on results that should come back today and then I am covered for the short term will be looking after st of year for more Original Message From mailto Sent Monday October AM To Drexelius Paul Subject Employees Im still passing out your name and number to people that are looking I only give it to people that I think would fit in a capacity role Are you OK with that or should I stop This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
LunchChris It was great seeing you at lunch lets keep in touch Paul
Lunchpst Chris It was great seeing you at lunch lets keep in touch Paul

RE Thankspst Anytime Original Message From Parks Joe mailtoJoe NRONcom Sent Tuesday February PM To Drexelius Paul Subject Thanks Paul Thanks for forwarding my resume to Tom I met with him and several other nice people over there this afternoon They seem like a great group to work with The position sounds very interesting and like it would be a good opportunity Hopefully something will work out Again I really appreciate your efforts Thanks Joe This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
